group_1.textRight: We brought this case for you, Mitama.

group_1.textLeft: Now, why would you do that?

group_1.textRight: If you don't mind...
Would you try wearing this kimono for New@Year's?
Right, for New Year's!
It's to say thanks, because you always take@such good care of us.
It's a gift full of our gratitude for the@year!
And, you know, we wanted to do something@nice that would make you happy.

group_1.textLeft: So you got me a kimono?

group_1.textRight: Yes! New Year's is getting closer and@closer, so it's perfect!
Well? You like it, right?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I do! I'm overjoyed. I've never worn a@kimono before.

group_1.textRight: It wasn't just us. We got help from the@other girls.
Asuka and her friends.
And Momoko's team!
You're so kind to keep the shop open right@up until New Year's.
So we all got together and thought of a nice@way to pay you back!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but you didn't need to go to all this@effort for little old me...

group_1.textRight: We wanted to, so don't worry about it.
Now be quiet and let us put it on you.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oooh, you're in a pushy mood today I see♪
Put it on me? We aren't going to a store@to have it put on?

group_1.textRight: We don't need to do that!
Yachiyo can do it for you!

group_1.textLeft: I don't have anything that would go with@a kimono.

group_1.textRight: I'll lend you those.
And if you come to our house, I'll dress@you on New Year's as well.

group_1.textLeft: That's lovely to hear...but I can't possibly@accept all of that.

group_1.textRight: Oh, but―!

group_1.textLeft: The kimono and being able to borrow your@accessories is enough for me.
I'll ask my parents to dress me on New@Year's.

group_1.textRight: Very well.
Then shall we get started?
I hope you like the pattern we picked out@for the fabric.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Well, I have a very particular@taste! A plain, ordinary kimono won't do.

group_1.textRight: Well, why don't we see about that, hm?
